text: The Karlsruher SV Rugby is a German rugby union club from Karlsruhe, currently playing in the 2. Rugby-Bundesliga. It is part of a larger club, the Karlsruher SV, which also offers other sports like tennis and association football. ==History== The KSV was formed in 1991 through a merger of to local clubs, the FC Nordstern Rintheim, formed 1909, and the FC Waldstadt, formed in 1962.Der Karlsruher Sportverein - Historisches KSV website - History, accessed: 8 April 2010 The clubs rugby department achieved promotion to the 2. Rugby-Bundesliga from the Rugby-Regionalliga in 2003, finishing fifth in the new league in its first season there. The second season ended with relegation back to the Regionalliga and it took the club until 2009, to return to the second division. Hopelessly outclassed at this level, the club withdrew its team from the competition at the winter break, KSV therefore being automatically relegated from the league.TotalRugby Review 2. Bundesliga: 12. Spieltag totalrugby.de, published: 28 March 2010, accessed: 30 March 2010 In 2010-11 KSV made a new start playing in the lowest league, the Rugby- Verbandsliga Baden-Württemberg, the fifth division, to rebuild and restructure the squad and management of the rugby department. In 2011-12 the team played in the Regionalliga Baden-Württemberg and finished in 2nd place. Since the 2012-13 season KSV plays in the 3rd Liga South/West. They finished the 2015-2016 Season in 2nd place and got repromoted to the 2. Rugby-Bundesliga, after winning the Playoff-Games against RC Unterföhring. ==Women's team== The Women's team is currently competing in the german-Rugby sevens-championship for women. ==Club honours== * Rugby-Regionalliga Baden-Württemberg ** Champions: 2009 ==Recent seasons== Recent seasons of the club:RugbyWeb Ergebnisarchiv rugbyweb.de - Results archive, accessed: 24 July 2012 {| class="wikitable" |- align="center" bgcolor="#dfdfdf" | Year | Division | Position |- align="center" | 2001-02 | align="left"| Rugby-Regionalliga Baden- Württemberg (III) | 6th |- align="center" | 2002-03 | align="left"| Rugby- Regionalliga Baden-Württemberg | 4th—Promoted |- align="center" | 2003-04 | align="left"| 2nd Rugby-Bundesliga South/West (II) | 5th |- align="center" | 2004-05 | align="left"| 2nd Rugby-Bundesliga South/West | 9th—Relegated |- align="center" | 2005-08 | colspan=2| did not compete 1 |- align="center" | 2008–09 | align="left"| Rugby-Regionalliga Baden-Württemberg (III) | 1st—Promoted |- align="center" | 2009–10 | align="left"| 2nd Rugby-Bundesliga South/West (II) | 10th—Relegated |- align="center" | 2010–11 | align="left"| Verbandsliga Baden-Württemberg (V) | ? |- align="center" | 2011–12 | align="left"| Regionalliga Baden-Württemberg (IV) | 2nd—Promoted |- align="center" | 2012–13 | align="left"| 3rd Liga South/West—South (III) | 2nd—Semi finals |- align="center" | 2013-14 | align="left"| 3rd Liga South/West—South | 3rd — Quarter finals |- align="center" | 2014-15 | align="left"| 3rd Liga South/West—South | 4th |- align="center" | 2015-16 | align="left"| 3rd Liga South/West—South | 2nd—Promoted |- align="center" | 2016-17 | align="left"| 2.
